title: The Golden Sayings of Epictetus - CLXVIII
author: Unknown
content:
Take what relates to the body as far as the bare use
warrantsâ€”as meat, drink, raiment, house and servants. But all
that makes for show and luxury reject.

This complete text of The Golden Sayings of Epictetus is in the public domain.


Also see Epictetus: A Stoic and Socratic Guide to Life
by A. A. Long.
